mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, NAME AS userName, ROLE AS role, LAWYER_STATUS AS status FROM PRJ01.USERS WHERE LAWYER_STATUS = 'PENDING' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, NAME AS userName, ROLE AS role, LAWYER_STATUS AS status FROM PRJ01.USERS WHERE ROLE = 'LAWYER' OR LAWYER_STATUS = 'PENDING' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, NAME AS userName, LAWYER_STATUS AS status, REJECT_REASON AS rejectReason FROM PRJ01.USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{lawyerId}
